sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-iframe', templateUrl: './iframe.component.html', styleUrls: ['./iframe.component.css'], }) export class IframeComponent { url1: string = ''; url2: string = ''; url3: string = ''; url4: string = ''; submitClicked: boolean = false; constructor(private router: Router) {} openIframes() { const urls = [this.url1, this.url2, this.url3, this.url4]; this.router.navigate(['/iframe-display'], { state: { urls } }); this.submitClicked = true; } }
